text: The Park Is Mine is a 1986 Canadian action movie directed by Steven Hilliard Stern and starring Tommy Lee Jones, Helen Shaver, Lawrence Dane, Yaphet Kotto, Peter Dvorsky, Eric Peterson, Gale Garnett, Denis Simpson, Carl Marotte. It was distributed by HBO. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 action movies Category:Canadian action movies Category:HBO Category:Television movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Steven Hilliard Stern Category:Movies set in Toronto
title: The Park Is Mine (1986 movie)
